summary.span: 包装计算项以进行生成

span.span: Wraps an evaluated item for build purposes

remarks.span: 不存储 XML 位置信息。

span.span: Does not store XML location information.

remarks.span: 由于已经执行了所有更正检查和计算，因此生成过程不需要此操作，因此不需要进行大容量检查。

span.span: That is not needed by the build process as all correctness checks and evaluation has already been performed, so it is unnecessary bulk.

span.span: The name of the metadata.

summary.span: 如果在此项上定义了特定元数据（即使其值为空字符串），则返回 true；否则返回 false。

span.span: Returns true if a particular piece of metadata is defined on this item (even if its value is empty string) otherwise false.

summary.span: 这包含内置元数据以及来自项定义的元数据。

span.span: if the metadata with the given name is defined on this item (even if its value is empty string); otherwise, .

remarks.span: 它必须包含所有这些数据，因为它用于批处理，这并不关心元数据的起源位置。

span.span: It has to include all of these because it's used for batching, which doesn't care where the metadata originated.

span.span: ITaskItem implementation

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现此方法时，请遵循以下指导原则。Follow the guidelines below when implementing this method. - 不要覆盖 属性。Do not overwrite the property. - 不要覆盖现有元数据条目。Do not overwrite existing metadata entries. - 不要复制对目标项没有意义的元数据项。Do not copy metadata entries that do not make sense on the destination item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 项规范是任意字符串。The item specification is an arbitrary string. 如果项表示磁盘上的文件，则项规范将是该文件的路径。If the item represents a file on disk, the item specification will be the path of that file. 项目文件中的以下项声明的为 `File.cs` 。The for the following item declaration in a project file is `File.cs`. ```xml ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示用于创建一个或多个目录的任务的代码。The following example shows the code for a task that creates one or more directories.
